title: The Great Gathering
description: In this exciting third and final book of the Keeper of the Windclaw Chronicles, Ellie finds herself at the heart of a conflict between animals of feather and animals of fur - the latter led by a fierce mountain lion - as they fight over whether to join the human and animals worlds And, she will learn of a boy with great gifts as great as her own who holds yet another key to her destiny. This young adult chapter book takes place on the Navajo Nation.
author: Seth Muller
